casebody.data:
Benson, Respondent, v. Manhattan Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 2, 1891.) Appeal from equity term. Action by Diedrich J. Benson against the Manhattan Railway Company and another. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendants appeal.

Argued before Truax and Dugro, J J.

Davies & Sapallo, for appellants. Leo C. Dessar, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment reversed, and new trial ordered, with costs to the appellants to abide the event, for the reasons assigned by this court in Cunningham v. Same Defendants, ante, 622, (decided at this general term.)
